WorkItem.Description: I tried new 2.0.8 version, but it crashes quite frequently, hogs CPU and it even sent my computer into blue screen after clicking on inspect. I am running Windows XP.
WorkItem.Summary: 100% CPU and continuouly increasing memory use if client disconnects without QUITing first

Comments.Message:
Hi

Thanks for submitting your problem. I've been aware of the CPU hogging problem for a while but unfortunately haven't had time to determine how to fix it.
I'm working on a fix now and the next release should fix this problem.

The crashes are probably out of memory exceptions caused by the loop the program ends up in reading endless blank lines.

Thanks
Rob
